message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be highly valuable for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $90 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit to $110. I think that's a fair price considering the value this product offers.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $95 for the product.
